body: At 2nd level, a sea reaver ignores any concealment provided by fog, rain, sleet, mist, wind, or other weather effects that is less than total concealment, and any penalties weather applies on Perception checks are halved. This ability replaces uncanny dodge.
name: Eyes of the Storm
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Barbarian/Barbarian Archetypes/Sea Reaver/Eyes of the Storm
